name: PhrogChamp
description:
Hello! 

FrogChamp is a game about climbing up a tree as a frog, the catch being ofcourse that every fall is a massive loss for progress. The game is short but challenging. The idea has been based on Jump King but with a bunch of twists. All the tools you get are: The mouse for movement - You can press left mouse button to make a small jump towards the cursor or you can hold and release for a bigger jump. The arrow keys for rotation - You can only stick to surfaces if youre facing them with your butt and arrow keys are here to help you with that!

Highly recommended to try and speedrun this game and share it with everyone in the comment section!

Art: Made in Aseprite by myself. Music: Eric Skiff - Song Name - Underclocked - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music
